content.title: Smith Machine Incline Tricep Extension Instructions

items: Adjust the smith machine to an incline position.
Attach a rope or straight bar to the cable machine.
Stand facing away from the machine and grasp the rope or bar with an overhand grip.
Extend your arms straight up above your head.
Lower the weight by bending your elbows and bringing the rope or bar behind your head.
Pause briefly at the bottom of the movement, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Repeat for desired number of reps.

content.title: Smith Machine Incline Tricep Extension Form & Visual
Smith Machine Incline Tricep Extension Benefits

items: Can be modified for different fitness levels
Targets muscles in a unilateral (one-sided) manner, helping to correct muscle imbalances
